acf.title: Head of Business Development, APAC
acf.bio_copy:
Benjamin Williams is the Head of Business Development, APAC and is responsible for overseeing a team based in Hong Kong, Singapore and Tokyo, who source and select new portfolio managers and investment professionals.

Prior to joining Millennium, Benjamin was a Managing Director and Head of Asia Pacific Financing Distribution at BofA Securities. He was also a member of the Equities Management team. Ben joined BofA in 2007 in London and was responsible for the distribution of equity products to institutional asset managers and hedge funds. In his previous role, he led multiple regional teams focused on equity financing solutions, portfolio finance, linear derivatives, securities lending and quantitative execution.

Benjamin received a BS in Economics from the University of Wales, Swansea. He received a Master’s degree in Global Finance from the NYU Stern School of Business.
